definitions.820-2936: What is 820-2936? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MB PRO 13" 2011 - do i have led return problem or just a bad lcd screen?
threads.message:
[PLAIN][SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MB PRO 13" 2011 - do i have led return problem or just a bad lcd screen?[/PLAIN]

<CHIP>U9000</CHIP> was dead so i've replaced. i havent try another display yet.

see attached photo. look like a star on the screen. it is not noticeable in real life but it is there..


do i have led return problem or just a bad lcd screen?


thanks :)

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MB PRO 13" 2011 - do i have led return problem or just a bad lcd screen?
